case mk.intro.intro
V : Type
G : SimpleGraph V
inst✝ : Finite V
s : (j : (Finset V)ᵒᵖ) → (componentComplFunctor G).obj j
property✝ : s ∈ SimpleGraph.end G
val✝ : Fintype V
v : V
h : v ∈ ↑(s Finset.univ.op)
⊢ False
content:
exact
      Set.disjoint_iff.mp (s _).disjoint_right
        ⟨by simp only [Opposite.unop_op, Finset.coe_univ, Set.mem_univ], h⟩

goalsBefore:
V : Type
G : SimpleGraph V
inst✝ : Finite V
⊢ ↑(SimpleGraph.end G) → False
content:
rintro ⟨s, _⟩
    cases nonempty_fintype V
    obtain ⟨v, h⟩ := (s <| Opposite.op Finset.univ).nonempty
    exact
      Set.disjoint_iff.mp (s _).disjoint_right
        ⟨by simp only [Opposite.unop_op, Finset.coe_univ, Set.mem_univ], h⟩
